actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution appointing the minority party's membership on the standing committees, the Select Committee on Small Business, and the Special Committee on Aging of the Senate for the 95th Congress.

summary.text: Appoints the minority party's membership on the standing committees, the Select Committee on Small Business and the Special Committee on Aging of the Senate.

titles.title: A resolution appointing the minority party's membership on the standing committees, the Select Committee on Small Business, and the Special Committee on Aging of the Senate for the 95th Congress.
